abstract: Montreal Canadiens forward Zack Kassian is suspended without pay and enters substance abuse program in wake of traffic accident.
lead_paragraph: Montreal Canadiens forward Zack Kassian entered a substance abuse program after being involved in a traffic accident early Sunday.

headline.main: Canadiens Forward Is Suspended After Accident
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Suspended in Montreal

snippet: Montreal Canadiens forward Zack Kassian entered a substance abuse program after being involved in a traffic accident early Sunday.
